Name: Glory Aeg- Order
Description: An epic weapon for Shield Knight.
Description$english: An epic weapon for Shield Knight.
Description2$english:
Handcrafted to perfection—though devoid of rare attributes, every detail is imbued with the artisan's soul.

Clad in unyielding steel, ablaze with silver radiance.

NeedMaterial.Name: Engram Dust Crystals
NeedMaterial.Description:
An exceptionally rare collected resource.
The higher level of the gatherable, the greater the chance of obtaining it. It is subject to a weekly acquisition limit.
NeedMaterial.Description$english:
An exceptionally rare collected resource.
The higher level of the gatherable, the greater the chance of obtaining it. It is subject to a weekly acquisition limit.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A rare crystal shimmering with starlight.

NeedMaterial.Name: High-Density Alloy Shard
NeedMaterial.Description: After collecting enough High-Density Alloy Shard, you can go to the Artisan Guild and exchange them for level 60 purple quality gear at the gear forging Artisan Harvey.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: After collecting enough High-Density Alloy Shard, you can go to the Artisan Guild and exchange them for level 60 purple quality gear at the gear forging Artisan Harvey.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: This alloy is smelted from materials from powerful monsters and rare minerals, capable of reacting to Engram and emitting a flickering glow. Due to its unique research value, it is highly favored by experts on the Bapharian Legacy.
